basic_info.description:
üëã I'm Allen Feng, a recent graduate from University of Washington with experience in backend/full-stack development. I am experienced in Java, JavaScript, Python and HTML/CSS. I am also experienced in tools like AWS Cloud, Redis and RabbitMQ to improve the performance and usability of web apps. 
 
 During my internship, I helped improve the e-commerce website loading speed from 5 seconds to 1 second and also implemented backend API of new features that improved revenue by 10%. 
 
 More info: Resume/Github/Linkedin at bottom of websiteüëá

projects.title: Internship - Ecommerce Website
projects.description:
Transformed e-commerce website architecture to support high concurrent shopping sessions.
 Developed REST API of the ‚Äúlimited time sale‚Äù feature that improved customer ordering percentage.
Accelerated website loading speed by 300% using static websites, Redis, and CDN.
Optimized system performance for asynchronous database processing using RabbitMQ.
Utilized Agile methodologies and Scrum framework to improve remote team development efficiency by 20%.

projects.title: Projects - Web 3.0 Marketplace
projects.description: An amazon website clone done using using JavaScript and Firebase. Features inclues user authentication, browsing products, and checkout.)

projects.title: Projects - Time management app
projects.description: One of the first apps I worked on,  allowing users to record and schedule events, and provide analyzed statistics to maximize efficiency. Implemented user authentication using AWS Cognito, and REST API with AWS Lambda.
